work_professional.gurmukhi: ਕਰਮੀ ਆਵੈ ਕਪੜਾ ਨਦਰੀ ਮੋਖੁ ਦੁਆਰੁ
work_professional.pronunciation: karmee aavai kaparraa nadaree mokh duaar
work_professional.translation: Through karma, comes the robe of honor; through His Grace, the door of liberation.
work_professional.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
work_professional.modern_context: Hard work and ethical conduct in professional life leads to success, but ultimate fulfillment comes through divine grace.
work_professional.practical_advice: Work diligently and honestly, but remember that results are in God's hands. Do your best and leave the rest to Waheguru.

work_professional.gurmukhi: ਘਾਲਿ ਖਾਇ ਕਿਛੁ ਹਥਹੁ ਦੇਇ ਨਾਨਕ ਰਾਹੁ ਪਛਾਣਹਿ ਸੇਇ
work_professional.pronunciation: ghaal khaae kichh hathahu dei naanak raahu pachaanahi sei
work_professional.translation: One who works for what they eat, and gives some of what they earn - O Nanak, they know the Path.
work_professional.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
work_professional.modern_context: Honest earning and sharing with others is the foundation of righteous living.
work_professional.practical_advice: Earn through honest means, avoid shortcuts or unethical practices, and always share your blessings with those in need.

family_relationships.gurmukhi: ਮਾਤ ਪਿਤਾ ਕੀ ਸੇਵਾ ਕਰੇ ਅੰਤ ਕਾਲਿ ਨ ਛੋਡੈ ਸੰਗੁ
family_relationships.pronunciation: maat pitaa kee sevaa kare ant kaal na chhodai sang
family_relationships.translation: One who serves their mother and father - their company shall not leave them even at the time of death.
family_relationships.author: Guru Arjan Dev Ji
family_relationships.modern_context: Caring for elderly parents is a sacred duty that brings spiritual merit and peace.
family_relationships.practical_advice: Make time for your parents despite busy schedules. Their blessings and wisdom are invaluable for your spiritual journey.

mental_wellness.translation: The Name of the Lord is the medicine for all diseases.
mental_wellness.author: Guru Arjan Dev Ji
mental_wellness.modern_context: Mental health issues like anxiety and depression can be helped through spiritual practice and remembering God.
mental_wellness.practical_advice: When feeling anxious or depressed, spend time in Naam Simran. Even 10 minutes of meditation can bring significant relief.

technology_balance.gurmukhi: ਮਾਇਆ ਮੋਹਣੀ ਮੋਹਿਆ ਮੋਹਣੀ ਮੋਹੈ ਮਾਇ
technology_balance.pronunciation: maiaa mohanee mohiaa mohanee mohai maai
technology_balance.translation: Maya is fascinating and deluding; the fascinating Maya has fascinated my mind.
technology_balance.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
technology_balance.modern_context: Social media and digital devices can be like Maya - fascinating but ultimately distracting from spiritual growth.
technology_balance.practical_advice: Set boundaries with technology. Designate phone-free times for prayer, family, and reflection.

spiritual_practice.gurmukhi: ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਵੇਲਾ ਸਚੁ ਨਾਉ ਵਡਿਆਈ ਵੀਚਾਰੁ
spiritual_practice.pronunciation: amrit velaa sach naau vadiaaee veechaar
spiritual_practice.translation: In the Amrit Vela, the ambrosial hours before dawn, chant the True Name, and contemplate His Glorious Greatness.
spiritual_practice.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
spiritual_practice.modern_context: Starting the day with spiritual practice sets a positive tone and connects us with the divine.
spiritual_practice.practical_advice: Wake up early for meditation and prayer. Even 15-20 minutes can transform your entire day.

community_service.translation: One who serves all beings finds peace.
community_service.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
community_service.modern_context: Serving others brings inner peace and fulfillment.
community_service.practical_advice: Look for opportunities to help others in your community.

personal_growth.translation: First, remove the falsehood of the mind.
personal_growth.author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
personal_growth.modern_context: Personal growth requires honest self-reflection and removing false beliefs.
personal_growth.practical_advice: Regularly examine your thoughts and motivations for truth and authenticity.

life_transitions.author: Guru Arjan Dev Ji
life_transitions.modern_context: Accepting divine will brings peace during life changes.
life_transitions.practical_advice: Focus on what you can control and surrender the rest.

health_healing.gurmukhi: ਤਨੁ ਮਨੁ ਧਨੁ ਸਭੁ ਸਉਪਿ ਗੁਰ ਕਉ
health_healing.pronunciation: tan man dhan sabh saupi gur kau
health_healing.translation: Surrender body, mind and wealth to the Guru.
health_healing.author: Guru Amar Das Ji
health_healing.modern_context: Health challenges require both medical care and spiritual surrender.
health_healing.practical_advice: Seek proper treatment while maintaining faith in divine will.

financial_guidance.translation: Contentment is the medicine for all ailments.
financial_guidance.author: Guru Arjan Dev Ji
financial_guidance.modern_context: Financial stress comes from endless desires. Contentment brings peace.
financial_guidance.practical_advice: Practice gratitude and live within your means.
